question:
[Leila] and [Henry] are siblings who are enjoying lunch together. [Alice] cooked dinner for her mother [Judy] and her brothers [Lawrence] and [Gerald]. [Larry] is buying his daughter [Leila] a brand new car for her birthday. [Lawrence]'s aunt [Janice] likes to drink a little bit too much wine at family gatherings. [Gerald]'s brother [Lawrence] would not let him play the xbox game. [Ethel] enjoyed a homemade dinner with her son [Henry] [Larry] and his sister [Judy] have been best friends ever since childhood.
Question: How is [Janice] related to [Ethel]?
